title: Give a Kiss to Paranoid Men - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Confinement   Determined Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Disabilities   Doting Love Interests   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Yandere   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Multiple Personalities   Possessive Characters   Schemes And Conspiracies   Strong Love Interests   System Administrator   Transmigration   Transported to Another World   Wealthy Characters   World Hopping
author: 山有青木
description:
There was often a male villain in romantic novels. They were paranoid and crazy. However, readers were disturbed by unfair treatment and bad endings. 

Then, Ji Ting who complained about the novel was bound by this kind of reader’s resentment. 

Since then, Ji Ting had shuttled back and forth in the novel world, dedicated to helping miserable side male leads change their ending and achieve wholeness.>
